review: I normally expect Apple products to be high quality but my Apple TV didn't cut it. I have had it for 1 year and 5 days and it no longer works (the warranty is one year). I started buffering for long periods during play on occasion a few months ago but I thought it was just temporary issues with the streaming. But now I can hardly get through 15 minutes without this. It also will freeze completely. I have to completely reset the device and then it is OK for a few hours then it starts again. I mostly use it for Netflix but I do also use trailers and podcasts.I have this on a high-end HD TV and picture quality is great. As usual, Apple has made the presentation slick and the hardware itself is attractive. I also have a Roku on another TV and it never has any problems. I have to replace the Apple TV and it will be with a Roku. If you must buy an Apple TV, you better get the 2-year warranty if you want something you can use for a while. My advice: buy a Roku!
